headline: O'Reilly’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: O’Reilly Automotive’s fourth quarter results drew a negative market reaction, as cost pressures weighed on what management described as a period of robust same-store sales growth and continued market share gains. CEO Brad Beckham credited strong professional segment performance and steady execution on new store openings for driving top-line momentum. However, both Beckham and CFO Jeremy Fletcher acknowledged that rising self-insurance and healthcare costs created unexpected headwinds, with Fletc
